title: Web
content:
eeper

Web can be cast by using the following Items:

Web Tips & Notes

Enwebbed Status Effect: Cannot move. Attack rolls against you have advantage, while your attack rolls have disadvantage. You also have disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.

Lvl 2 Spells Aid ♦ Arcane Lock ♦ Barkskin ♦ Blindness ♦ Blur ♦ Branding Smite ♦ Calm Emotions ♦ Chromatic Orb: Acid (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Cold (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Fire (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Lightning (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Poison (Lvl 2)
